snippet: Yola Monakhov Stockton, a photographer raised in New York and Jersey City, has collected her observations of the river in a series called “Empire Pictures of the Hudson.”
abstract: Photographer Yola Monakhov Stockton has collected her black-and-white observations of Hudson River in series Empire Pictures of the Hudson.
lead_paragraph: Yola Monakhov Stockton, a photographer raised in New York and Jersey City, has collected her observations of the river in a series called “Empire Pictures of the Hudson.”

headline.main: The Hudson River Runs Through Them
